array.string: CREATE TABLE APDBAdInstance (handle TEXT PRIMARY KEY, campaign TEXT DEFAULT NULL, adGroup TEXT DEFAULT NULL, ad TEXT DEFAULT NULL, creative TEXT DEFAULT NULL, bundleId TEXT DEFAULT NULL, searchTermId TEXT DEFAULT NULL, adamId TEXT DEFAULT NULL, adType INTEGER NOT NULL, adFormatType INTEGER DEFAULT NULL, containerType INTEGER NOT NULL, relayData BLOB DEFAULT NULL, adMetadataData BLOB DEFAULT NULL, propertiesData BLOB DEFAULT NULL, brand TEXT DEFAULT NULL, advertiserCategory TEXT DEFAULT NULL)
